articles.author: Annie Massa
articles.title: Trump Media Losses Surge as It Hands Staff $107 Million in Stock - Bloomberg
articles.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. rewarded employees with more than $107 million in stock last year as revenue declined and it posted a $401 million loss.
articles.content:
Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. rewarded employees with more than $107 million in stock last year as revenue declined and it posted a $401 million loss.
The company, which runs Truth Social… [+202 chars]
